summary: This Mod replaces the stock sounds of the Dwarven Spider with a new more intolerable personality core Mk G.I.R. The first and only technological collaboration of the Dwermer and now extinct Irken Race ( to be fair there was only one...nobody knew except this big headed Nord kid)
descriptionHtml:
This mod was inspired by the swearing and Dr. Zoidberg Mudcrabs. Figured it\'d be funny to add some personality to the dwarven spiders. 

Youtube Video\'s
#1 Summoning and Death
[youtube]i86m_fmWpTU[/youtube]

Big attack Group

[youtube]-JKe2sgDTJU[/youtube]  
Installation

1.Unzip the 7z file
2.Drop into your data file and merge
3.????
4. Behold the Pinnacle of Dwermer/Irken ingenuity!

P.S this mod goes great with the Rings of Summoning, letting you have your own personal G.I.R. Unit
author: Redman420
